import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import productcontext from "../context/Productcontext"; import StarRatings from "react-star-ratings"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; const {Link} = require("react-router-dom"); export default function Productdetails() { const { singleproduct,addid ,addtocart} = useContext(productcontext); const[size,setsize]=useState({size:""}) const[quantity,setquantity]=useState(1) const[nullsize,setnullsize]=useState() const onclick=async()=>{ if(size.size.length=0) { setnullsize("please select a size ") } else{ await addtocart(addid,quantity,size.size)} } const onchange=(e)=>{ // e.preventDefault(); setsize({ size:e.target.value }) console.log(size) } const onplus=()=>{ setquantity(quantity+1) } const onminus=()=>{ if(quantity>1){ setquantity(quantity-1) } } return ( <>
